text: (ai rasool inase) kah do ki jin logon ko tum khud khuda ke siva (maabood) samajhate ho pukaaro (to maaloom ho jaega ki) vah log zarra baraabar na aasamaanon mein kuchh ikhateyaar rakhate hain aur na zameen mein aur na unakee un donon mein shirakat hai aur na unamen se koee khuda ka (kisee cheez mein) maddagaar hai
